description:
Beretta "The Little Pistol" James dishes out three rounds of punishment on Tegan "The Tiny Terror" Tate, giving her a first match she'll never forget!
Petite angel, Rookie Tegan was in for trouble as soon as she stepped on the wrestling mat with the voluptuous beauty, Beretta James. Any hope that Beretta would go easy on her was quickly smashed as Beretta threw her down into the mat and lifted her up in hold after glorious, painful hold.
You've never seen anything like this! Out-standing hold after out-mother-fucking-standing hold! Multiple submits! Orgasm on the mat!
In Round 4, The Tiny Terror proves she's good at one thing: being Beretta's submissive whore. In the words of Beretta herself, "Today your pussy is my little cum dumpster."
title: History in the Making! Ultimate Blow-Out! Beretta vs Wrestling Virgin!
